name: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, a world where humans are changed into beasts.
keywords: studio ghibli,turned into a pig,parent child relationship,spirit world,child protagonist

review.author: Marshall-D-Teach
review.heading: Great
review.reviewBody: Despite an overlong run time, Spirited Away is a visually stunning film filled with some of the most imaginative characters I've ever seen. In addition to the visuals, the music is beautiful, and the story has something for audience members of all ages.
